description: Line drawing of coastal mountainous landscape (Sierra Madre del Sur) near Acapulco, Mexico
inscription: Inscribed in brown ink, lower right: Near Acapulco-Coast of Mexico
medium: Pen and brown ink on tracing paper, mounted on light gray paper
provenance: Blakelock family; (Young's Art Gallery, Chicago): sold to MIA, 1915.
signed: Signed in brown ink, lower right corner: Blakelock
title: Near Acapulco, Coast of Mexico
